Package edu.pdx.cs.joy.di

package edu.pdx.cs.joy.di

Tests for classes that demonstrate Dependency Injection that leverage the Mockito mock object framework.

  • http://www.slideshare.net/rapaul/mockito-presentation
    • http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rOcuSPUpuXs
    • http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fisGZtYRIso
    • http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UIjQ4zQ5oGA
